item.description:
6pm to 9pm, but longer if the room is active

Are you wondering about this weekend's hike? The weather?

Got questions?

Just want to say hi?

We have a hikers chat!

I suggest you register under your trail name. and rsvp so we know who we are chatting with. List your skype name so we can add you.


You need to register for a free Skype account for this.

Want to chat about your latest hike? I'm not one to sit too long at the computer, but if I see a conversation going, this could be fun.

Let's chat


Here is the link below:

Meetup Click here: New England Hiking Meetup Chat

This link will work anytime, so you can chat at other times
item.name: New England Hiking Meetup Chat via Skype
